text: Loïc Vadelorge (born 26 November 1964)Loïc Vadelorge sous la direction de is a French historian, teacher of at the Paris 13 UniversityVADELORGE Loïc and former teacher Loïc Vadelorge at the Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin- en-YvelinesLoïc Vadelorge (1998 to 2009) and at the University of Rouen from 1992 to 1994.Loïc Vadelorge He obtained a PhD in 1996. Member of the Research Centre Economies, Societies, Cultures, his research focuses on the history of cultural policies, the history of cities and equipment. ==Further reading== * Rouen sous la IIIe République.
